page.title: 07PARTRIDGE GREEN FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My name is NICOLA HUTTON.We have lived in a 3 bedroom terrace house in the High Street since I was born 10 years ago.My grand parents live nearby.Only 3 years ago my sister was born.My dad is a butcher and works for Mr.Mitchell in his long established shop almost next door to our house.He gets up first at 6.45am. and makes the tea.After a bowl of cereal he starts work at 7.30am.He likes birdspotting,shooting and walking.Mum works part time in the afternoons as an office cleaner on the industrial estate.She enjoys knitting and keeping house plants.She shops in Partridge Green.At weekends we go swimming and in the summer have picnics.Our favourite family meal is steak,onions and mashed potatoes.
